Senior Full Stack Java Developer - Java, Spring, JavaScript, Angular, Typescript, BDD, TDD, CI/CD/DevOps
My client are looking to take on a number of permanent Full Stack Java Developers to join their growing team based in North Bristol. You will have the opportunity to work in a supportive, nurturing environment where you will work with the latest tools and technologies and be rewarded for your hard work with a competitive salary (£40,000 - £60,000 DOE) and promotions and pay increases based upon your technical capability and performance, not just how long you've worked there. Additionally you will receive a generous pension and free parking on-site.
Essential Skillset / Experience
- Experience of Full Stack Software development - Java - Spring - JavaScript OR Typescript
Desirable Skillset / Experience
- Angular (React would also be beneficial) - TypeScript - APIs: RESTful Web Services - Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) & DevOps practices - Agile / Scrum & TDD / BDD
If you meet the above requirements and would be interested in finding out more about this opportunity, please apply with an updated CV ASAP as they are looking to move fairly quickly with these opportunities.
